game.name: Yooca: Your Life
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동, 앱 내 구매
game.shortDescription: Yooca: Your Life is a growing social world built around play, friendship, and creativity. Start on the cycling track, master your sprints, and prepare to explore a world that’s expanding far beyond racing. Race with up to 8 other players
game.shortDescriptionEn: Yooca: Your Life is a growing social world built around play, friendship, and creativity. Start on the cycling track, master your sprints, and prepare to explore a world that’s expanding far beyond racing. Race with up to 8 other players
